name: Descent: Heavenly Coils
statusOutcome: {attackerName} descends in a flash, coiling and wrapping her serpentine body around {targetName}!
statusMiss: {attackerName} sends out and misses! This also shouldn't happen so report it to Kaa!
restraintStruggleCharmed: {targetName} squirms against {attackerName}'s slippery coils, barely resisting the urge to settle into the restraining embrace of {targetHisOrHer} dragon goddess...
restraintEscaped: {targetName} manages to free himself of the restraining serpent coils!
restraintEscapedFail: But {targetName} remains bound by the slimy serpent coils!
